title: Resort
description: Full Stack App built with React and Contentful Api using also React Icons, React Router and React Context Api to manage Components State.

title: Contact Keeper
description: A MERN Stack Contacts Manager App. On the Back-End it is built using: Node, Express, JWT, Express-Validator, MongoDB and Mongoose. Front-End is created using React (Hooks and Context Api).

title: Github Finder
description: Front End Application built using React and the Github Api to search users profile. State is managed with Hooks and Context Api

title: HKR News
description: Front End Application built using React and Hacker News Api to search for posts and news related with the the search term. Built with 'legacy' React (Class based Components)

title: Clear View Escape
description: Front End Website Layout built with a Gulp Environment, Webpack, PostCSS and different plugins to manage animations and images loading

title: Greatsby
description: Starter Theme for a personal blog website built with Gatsby and Contentful Cms. I've added some very basic styles using Sass

title: Studio Barberio
description: Website for an italian Law Firm based in Rome. Built with Gatsby and Netlify CMS. Styled with Bootstrap 4 and Styled Components

title: Pro Loco Nepi
description: Website for an italian Local Tourism Organization. Built with Gatsby and Contentful CMS. Completely styled with Styled Components. Layout done with CSS Flexbox and Grid.

title: Roma Travel Agency
description: A responsive Travel Agency Website made with Flexbox. Part of Advanced Web Dev Bootcamp Course - CSS Section.

title: Natours
description: A responsive Travel Agency Website made with Flexbox and Sass. Part of Jonas Schmedtmann Advanced CSS and Sass Course.

title: Elite
description: UI Design for a booking application or website built with Flexbox, CSS Grid and Sass. Part of Jonas Schmedtmann Advanced CSS and Sass Course.

title: Nexter
description: UI Design for a Luxury Real Estate Agency application or website built with Flexbox, CSS Grid and Sass. Part of Jonas Schmedtmann Advanced CSS and Sass Course.

title: Museo Civico Nepi
description: Website for an italian local museum. Built with Gatsby and Netlify CMS. Styled with Styled Components with a heavy use of CSS Grid.
